data.name: AccessCharge
data.value: Access charge for non-geographic calls to numbers starting 084, 087, 118 – 15p/min

data.name: AnytimeLandlineParagraph
data.value: Our Anytime call package helps keep you in touch, with inclusive local, national and UK mobile calls at any time.

data.name: AnytimeLandlineTitle
data.value: Anytime

data.name: AnytimePlusParagraph
data.value: With Anytime Plus, calls to 01/02/03 numbers, UK mobiles, fixed line calls to 35 international destinations are included.

data.name: AnytimePlusTitle
data.value: Anytime Plus

data.name: Call084522p
data.value: 0845 – 15p/min up to max of 22p/min

data.name: Call087028p

data.name: CallCharge23
data.value: Call set-up charge – 23p per call

data.name: CallCharge23Long
data.value: Call set-up fee for non-inclusive calls – 23p per call

data.name: EveningAndWeekendParagraph
data.value: Our Evening and Weekend call packages includes local, national and UK mobile calls from 7pm to 7am weekdays, and anytime at weekends up to midnight Sunday. Maximum duration for inclusive calls: 70 minutes.

data.name: EveningAndWeekendTitle
data.value: Evening & Weekend

data.name: InternatCalls20p
data.value: International calls to 35 selected countries (Band A) – 20p/min

data.name: InternatCals20p70mins
data.value: International calls to 35 selected countries (Band A) – inclusive up to 70 mins per call, then 20p/min.
